title: PHASE 1.3: Redundancy Detection - Verify redundancy-map.json
description: Verify redundancy-map.json is complete. Semantic analysis of documentation for overlapping content. Code duplication detection (functions, components, utilities). Configuration file consolidation opportunities. Asset deduplication (images, icons, fonts). Test file rationalization. Deliverable: Verified redundancy-map.json with duplication clusters.

title: PRIORITY 2: Favicon Optimization - Reduce file size by 80%
description: Current favicon.ico is 66KB (oversized). Optimize to <10KB. Use modern favicon generation tools. Maintain quality while reducing size. Target: 50-80% size reduction.

title: PHASE 3.1: Favicon Optimization - Reduce file size by 80%
description: Optimize src/app/favicon.ico from 66KB to <10KB. Generate modern favicon set using favicon.io or similar tools. Replace current oversized favicon. Impact: Faster page loads, reduced bandwidth on every request.

title: PHASE 1.1: Automated Testing Suite Setup - CI/CD test automation
description: Set up automated testing suites with daily execution. Configure CI/CD test automation (Jest + React Testing Library). Implement test coverage tracking. Configure daily test runs. Integrate with PR workflow for quality gates.

title: PHASE 3.1: Success Metrics Framework - MVP and excellence criteria
description: Define success metrics framework. Create MVP launch criteria (45 days): Core functionality completion, user retention >75%, performance benchmarks, security standards. Define full excellence criteria (120 days): Advanced features, enterprise scalability, market leadership metrics.

title: üßπ BIRTHDAYGEN CLEANUP MISSION
description: Repository optimization and technical debt reduction. Provides clean foundation for rapid development. Success criteria: Clean foundation, 40% repository size reduction, security risks eliminated.

title: PHASE 2.1: Binary Documentation Cleanup - Convert DOCX/ZIP to Markdown
description: Convert 8 DOCX files in prompts/agent/ (437KB) to Markdown format. Remove prompts/agent.zip (334KB). Convert binary docs to text for better version control and 80% size reduction. Keep only essential PDFs. Update all references after conversion.

title: PRIORITY 3: Maintenance Setup - Automated cleanup and monitoring
description: Set up automated maintenance. Regular cleanup scripts. File size monitoring. Dependency update automation. Documentation update automation.

title: PHASE 2.2: Cognitive Prioritization Intelligence - Risk-adjusted scoring framework
description: Implement advanced prioritization: (Impact √ó Urgency √ó Feasibility) √∑ Risk. Create stakeholder value mapping and technical debt scoring. Map features to user needs (card creation, personalization, automation, contact management). Generate P1-P4 prioritization matrix with business rationale.

title: PHASE 4.2: Performance Optimization - Improve repository performance
description: Git repository optimization (git gc, repack). Large file management (.gitattributes). CI/CD pipeline efficiency improvements. Documentation search/indexing optimization. Deliverable: performance-improvements.md

title: PHASE 3.1: Archive Creation - Preserve potentially useful content
description: Create docs/archive/ directory structure. Move outdated docs to appropriate archive subfolders. Create archival metadata (why archived, when, by whom). Ensure archived content remains searchable. Deliverable: Organized archive with metadata.

title: PHASE 0.1: Semantic Analysis & Safety Validation - Complete repository analysis
description: PHASE 1: INTELLIGENT ANALYSIS & CATEGORIZATION - Complete repository analysis before cleanup. This phase includes: 1.1 File Inventory & Relationship Mapping (cleanup-analysis.json), 1.2 Content Freshness Analysis (freshness-report.md exists), 1.3 Redundancy Detection (redundancy-map.json exists), 1.4 Bloat Assessment (bloat-analysis.md exists). Create missing cleanup-analysis.json, verify other deliverables are complete.

title: PHASE 1.1: Explore Documentation Structure - Map entire docs/ folder
description: Map entire docs/ folder structure and organization. Identify key documentation files and their relationships. Create documentation inventory with file types and purposes. Focus on: docs/, README.md, setup docs, feature docs.

title: üîç BIRTHDAYGEN FEATURE ANALYSIS MISSION
description: Comprehensive feature inventory and development roadmap. Generates executable tasks for development. Success criteria: Complete feature roadmap with executable tasks, P1-P4 prioritization matrix.

title: PHASE 1.4: Bloat Assessment - Verify bloat-analysis.md
description: Verify bloat-analysis.md is complete. Large file analysis (>1MB each). Unused dependency detection. Cache/temp file identification. Log file accumulation assessment. Build artifact cleanup opportunities. Deliverable: Verified bloat-analysis.md with size breakdown and recommendations.

title: PHASE 1.3: Multi-Agent Feature Analysis Enhancement - Parallel AI analysis
description: Deploy AI agents for parallel analysis of Core Card Creation, AI Personalization, Backend Integration, Contact Management, Automation. Use semantic search and ML clustering to enhance feature analysis with deeper insights and automated gap detection. Identify feature completeness per area.

title: PHASE 2.1: Codebase Feature Verification - Cross-reference documented vs implemented
description: Systematically verify each documented feature against codebase implementation. Check: Card Creation Platform (70%), AI Personalization (60%), Supabase Backend (80%), Contact Management (50%), Automation (40%). Create gap report showing missing/incomplete features.

title: PHASE 4.1: Dependency Audit & Cleanup - Remove unused packages
description: Audit 87 total dependencies (75 production, 12 dev). Identify unused packages using depcheck or similar. Remove unused dependencies. Test builds after each removal. Goal: Reduce dependencies by 20-30% if possible while maintaining functionality.

title: CRITICAL: Fix Next.js build error preventing Vercel deployment
description: Build error STILL FAILING. Previous fix attempt was incorrect - build still fails with 'TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading hash)'. User correctly identified that success was fabricated. Actual status: Build fails, error persists. Need to properly investigate and fix root cause. tsconfig.json currently includes .next/types/**/*.ts which may or may not be the issue - need to verify actual cause.

title: PHASE 5.1: Validation & Verification - Test all cleanup changes
description: PHASE 4.1: Functionality Verification - Ensure nothing is broken. Full build test (npm run build). Type checking (npm run typecheck). Test suite execution (npm test). API endpoint validation. Component rendering tests. Deliverable: validation-results.md with test outcomes.

title: PHASE 1.2: AI-Assisted Code Review Automation - Quality gate integration
description: Deploy AI-assisted code review automation. Set up automated code review with AI analysis. Integrate with PR workflow. Configure quality gates. Enhance existing development workflow with intelligent code analysis.

title: PHASE 2.1: Safe Deletion Simulation - Dry run validation
description: Test cleanup without actual changes. Simulate file moves/deletions. Validate no broken imports or references. Test build process integrity. Verify git relationships preserved. Check for any functionality dependencies. Deliverable: dry-run-results.md with safety validation. Blocks: All Phase 3 cleanup execution tasks.

title: PHASE 1.2: Content Freshness Analysis - Verify freshness-report.md
description: Verify freshness-report.md is complete. Analyze file modification dates vs project timeline. Cross-reference docs against current codebase reality. Identify aspirational vs implemented features in documentation. Flag files older than 90 days for review. Categorize docs as: current, partially outdated, completely outdated, irrelevant. Deliverable: Verified freshness-report.md with aging analysis.

title: PHASE 3.3: Bloat Removal - Eliminate unnecessary space
description: Remove unused dependencies (after verification). Clean temporary/cache files. Archive large unused assets. Compress log files or implement rotation. Remove build artifacts from version control. Deliverable: space-recovery-report.md with savings metrics.

title: PHASE 3.2: Redundancy Consolidation - Merge duplicate content
description: Consolidate overlapping documentation sections. Merge duplicate utility functions with deprecation warnings. Unify similar configuration files. Combine related test files. Create redirect/symlinks where appropriate. Deliverable: consolidation-report.md with merge details.

title: PHASE 3.1: Feature Analysis Report - FEATURES-[DATE].md with health score
description: Create FEATURES-[DATE].md with complete analysis. Include executive summary with health score (current: 7.2/10), detailed feature inventory by area, gap analysis (documented vs implemented), prioritization matrix (P1-P4), and development roadmap (45-120 day timeline).

title: PRIORITY 3: Performance Optimization - Improve repository performance
description: Analyze repository performance bottlenecks. Optimize build times. Improve CI/CD performance. Cache optimization. File size monitoring.

title: PHASE 3.4: Documentation Rationalization - Streamline docs structure
description: Update navigation and cross-references. Consolidate scattered information into coherent docs. Remove truly irrelevant content (marketing materials, old specs). Create documentation index/map. Update README and contribution guides. Deliverable: docs-rationalization.md with new structure.

title: PHASE 1.1: File Inventory & Relationship Mapping - Create cleanup-analysis.json
description: Scan entire repository structure. Map file relationships (imports, references, dependencies). Identify file categories: source, config, docs, assets, tests, scripts. Create dependency graph showing what depends on what. Flag files with no incoming references (potential orphans). Deliverable: cleanup-analysis.json with full relationship map. Blocks: All cleanup execution tasks.

title: PHASE 4.1: Development Task List Generation - Create executable task list
description: Generate comprehensive development task list from feature analysis. Structure tasks by priority level (P1-P4) and dependency relationships. Include effort estimates and implementation guidance. Create development-tasks-[DATE].md with all actionable tasks ready for Beads conversion.

title: PHASE 4.2: Convert Task List to Beads Issues - Automated conversion
description: Convert development-tasks-[DATE].md to Beads issues using ./scripts/tasklist-to-beads.sh. Link all tasks to Feature Analysis epic (BirthdayGen.com-9el). Set up proper dependencies between tasks. Verify all tasks created successfully with proper metadata.

title: PHASE 1.1: Security Risk Elimination - Remove extracted codebase files
description: Remove security risk files: codebase_content.txt (78KB), complete_codebase.txt (2.5KB). These contain complete codebase snapshots that pose security vulnerability. Action: rm codebase_content.txt complete_codebase.txt && git commit -m 'security: remove extracted codebase files'

title: PHASE 2.3: Extract Scripts Consolidation - Organize and consolidate
description: Move 4 extract scripts from root to scripts/extract/ directory. Consolidate functionality if possible. Update any references. Scripts: extract_backend_here.sh, extract_codebase.sh, extract_full_codebase.sh, extract_simple.sh

title: PHASE 3.2: Documentation Consolidation - Merge redundant setup docs
description: Merge setup.md, SETUP_COMPLETE.md, and README.md setup sections into single comprehensive setup guide. Rationalize Triple System documentation (4 overlapping docs). Keep TRIPLE_SYSTEM_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md as main reference, consolidate others into index.

title: PHASE 1.2: Package Manager Standardization - Resolve npm/pnpm conflict
description: Choose pnpm as standard package manager. Test pnpm install && pnpm run build. If successful, remove package-lock.json (613KB). This eliminates 33% repository bloat and build inconsistencies. Action: rm package-lock.json && git commit -m 'chore: standardize on pnpm'

title: PHASE 1.2: Read Core Documentation - CURRENT_GOALS, FEATURE_LIST, GAP_ANALYSIS
description: Read CURRENT_GOALS.md, FEATURE_LIST.md, GAP_ANALYSIS.md, FUTURE_STATE.md, README.md. Extract all documented features, goals, and requirements. Map to implementation status. Identify documented vs implemented features.

title: PHASE 1.3: Development Velocity Tracking - Predictive bottleneck identification
description: Implement predictive development velocity tracking. Create velocity metrics dashboard. Track story points, completion rates. Identify bottlenecks automatically. Set up progress tracking and automated reporting.

title: üéØ BIRTHDAYGEN AI ACCELERATION MISSION
description: Intelligent orchestration and acceleration framework. Meta-layer that enhances all development work. Success criteria: 2-4x development velocity, zero bottlenecks.

title: PHASE 2.2: Log File Cleanup - Remove development logs
description: Remove development log files: dev.log, server.log, .beads/daemon.log. These are runtime artifacts that should not be committed. Add *.log to .gitignore if not already present. Clean up any log directories.

title: PRIORITY 2: Dependency Audit & Cleanup - Remove unused packages
description: Audit package.json dependencies. Identify unused packages. Remove dead code dependencies. Verify all dependencies are necessary. Update package.json. Run pnpm install to verify.

title: PHASE 4.3: Maintenance Setup - Prevent future bloat
description: Create cleanup automation scripts. Set up size monitoring alerts. Establish documentation update policies. Create archival procedures. Deliverable: maintenance-playbook.md

title: PHASE 2.2: Impact Assessment - Cost-benefit analysis
description: Quantify cleanup benefits and risks. Calculate space savings. Assess maintenance burden reduction. Identify relationship preservation confidence. Create rollback plan for each operation. Generate risk mitigation strategies. Deliverable: impact-assessment.md with cost-benefit analysis.

title: PHASE 2.1: Parallel Development Stream Coordination - 4-stream setup
description: Establish parallel development stream coordination. Define 4 development streams: Stream A (Critical Path - core fixes), Stream B (User Experience - UI/UX), Stream C (Infrastructure - API/performance), Stream D (Innovation - AI/ML features). Create coordination mechanism and conflict resolution process.
